extensionDescription.message: Adds a context submenu to tag quotes, images, and links as BB Code or Markdown

menuItemMultiMode.description: Title of context menu item that toggles multiple tags when clicked.

menuItemQuote.description: Title of context menu item that tags the selected text when clicked.

menuItemCode.description: Title of context menu item that tags the selected text as code when clicked.

menuItemImageFull.description: Title of context menu item that tags both the image and its link (if any) when clicked.

menuItemImage.description: Title of context menu item that tags an image when clicked.

menuItemLink.description: Title of context menu item that tags a link when clicked.

menuClearClipboard.description: Title of context menu item that clears the clipboard when clicked.

optionBbCode.description: Title of option to output as BB Code.

optionMarkdown.description: Title of option to output as Markdown.

labelOutputFormat.message: Choose to tag as BB Code or Markdown:
labelOutputFormat.description: Title of options page label for the output format setting.

labelLineBreaks.message: Choose how many line breaks to insert between tags:
labelLineBreaks.description: Title of options page label for the line breaks setting.

optionNone.description: Title of option for no line breaks.

optionOne.description: Title of option for one line break.

optionTwo.description: Title of option for two line breaks.

submitSave.description: Title of submit button for the options page.

errorNoSelection.description: Error message when there is no selected text.

errorNoImage.description: Error message when there is no image.

errorNoLink.description: Error message when there is no image.
